mapper.update: UPDATE T_UTILITIES_INVOICE SET INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType}, INVOICE_COMPANY = #{invoiceCompany}, BASIC_WATER_FEE = #{basicWaterFee}, BASIC_WATER_INVOICE_SUM = #{basicWaterInvoiceSum}, CARTE_TIME = #{carteTime}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, UTILITIES_DETAILS_ID = #{utilitiesDetailsId}, BASIC_ELECTRIC_FEE = #{basicElectricFee}, BASIC_ELECTRIC_INVOICE_SUM = #{basicElectricInvoiceSum} WHERE UTILITIES_INVOICE_ID = #{utilitiesInvoiceId}
mapper.select: SELECT UTILITIES_INVOICE_ID, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_COMPANY, BASIC_WATER_FEE, BASIC_WATER_INVOICE_SUM, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UTILITIES_DETAILS_ID, BASIC_ELECTRIC_FEE, BASIC_ELECTRIC_INVOICE_SUM FROM T_UTILITIES_INVOICE WHERE UTILITIES_INVOICE_ID = #{utilitiesInvoiceId}

SELECT UTILITIES_INVOICE_ID, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_COMPANY, BASIC_WATER_FEE, BASIC_WATER_INVOICE_SUM, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UTILITIES_DETAILS_ID, BASIC_ELECTRIC_FEE, BASIC_ELECTRIC_INVOICE_SUM FROM T_UTILITIES_INVOICE
